title: Pageant Place Font
content:
Need the font for the Pageant Place part. Thanks ahead of time.

comments.content: I see [Zapfino](http://web.archive.org/web/20140831100005/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Zapfino). This /P might come from one of the Extras or as OpenType features I guess.
